attributes.title: God forbid don’t download this app
attributes.review: I cannot express my disappointment. This app honestly must have been coded by toddlers because the interface is completely unusable and everything is in Japanese!!!! Like what the heck!

attributes.title: Horrible in general
attributes.review: It was taking forever to load and is full of garbage and it took months to let me see what was actually happened so I don’t recommend

attributes.title: this app made me vote for biden
attributes.review: i cant believe how long it took to install this app. i’m beyond disappointed that i was unable to use my phone for 3 days while it was downloading. after the app was installed my phone was glitching so badly i could barley call my mother. what if something happened where i needed to call the police but i couldn’t because this app ruined my phone?! it’s disgusting how trump thinks this is okay.
This app is so bad it took me days to download and it spamming me with notifications even though do not want them why would this app be on here it so bad I can’t even update my games cause of this

attributes.title: Worst app created
attributes.review: This app is awful. Just the function on it doesn’t work well. Also the app tracks you when asking for permission. It was a terrible idea in the first place.

attributes.title: 0 stars for you dump truck
attributes.review: There is nothing else to say other than wose app ever i dont even get what the app is for like is he scared he is going to loose the electoin so hes trying to win everythi g back or sum well its not going to work worst president ever

attributes.title: uhh.... chile anyways soooo...
attributes.review: So i downloaded this app then this orange thing started yelling at me that nobody but cis, white, straight, men deserve rights. i got so scared and threw my phone across the room! then donald trump manifested in my room and started screaming at me. he made me cry🤬 anyways don’t download the app and stan bernie🥰

attributes.title: TRASH
attributes.review: I tried to download the app and it kept asking for my credit card information....I thought showing support was free. Then when I finally was able to get the app it kept crashing. THIS APP IS HORRIBLE, DO NOT GET IT!!!

The app took 15 days to download and had a orange when I opened it 🤕🤕🤕👽🤡 .the orange 🍊 was a racist homophobic joke he does not belong in the White House 😒🤓 like all his supporters they are all orange and hit me with a brick and killed me 😌😒😒😞 they are discussing like this small app not big small

attributes.title: Not the vibe
attributes.review: If I could give this 0 stars I would, the app took way too long to download, and makes no sense at all, if trump gets elected again, I might have to cancel my subscription on life.
